content: The schedule for AITP 2024 (which is this week) just came out. http://aitp-conference.org/2024/#program
This looks amazing. Do you know if any resources will be released for public consumption? Thank you.
Brilliant, thanks. I didnâ€™t see the links at first :)

It looks like Josef posted the slides and abstracts for AITP 2024 at http://aitp-conference.org/2024/#program . I'm not sure if he recorded the talks. He has in years past. I wasn't there physically, so I don't know, but maybe someone who was there is person would know.
